vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀσσάριον, τό,
(Latin assarius (i.e. nummus)), [NT+1st c.BC+]
__II a sort of valve, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: assarion (coin worth one-sixteenth of a day’s wage)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
assarion (coin worth one-sixteenth of a day’s wage)
dimin. of the Latin, as, a Roman brass coin with the value of one-tenth of a denarius, or δραχμή, used to convey the idea of a trifle or very small sum, Mt. 10:29; Lk. 12:6*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: as (moneda de cobre romana que valía 1/16 de denario), cuarto, moneda
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
羅馬銅幣, 相當於銀幣denarius的十六分之一,
和合本譯為"銀子" (太 10:29; 路 12:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
罗马铜币, 相当于银币denarius的十六分之一,
和合本译为"银子" (太 10:29; 路 12:6)
